hiveArticle.title: Festivity All Around
hiveArticle.body:
So the festive season in India has been started, first one was Navratri or Durga Puja whereas in a week's time it will be Diwali. Diwali is most celebrated festival in India where everyone will light up their home and surroundings, it is just like good fighting the evil.

We light up our homes to keep the darkness away, we pray to keep everyone healthy, safe and prosperous. We eat without worrying about getting fat and we burn crackers. So as the festive season has started a lot of malls will be decorated, one such mall which I visited today was Garuda Mall in Bangalore.

In the entrance there was a kind of lighting which denotes a Grand Gate of a palace.

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/p2cuv5bkub.jpg)

Then we have few sculptures here and there which are truly art and made by hand.

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/5kqo2wi8j8.jpg)

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/z9zwukrkoh.jpg)

These shots are not great as I was in a hurry, sorry about that.
